CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?
CTR.A: This chart is a {stacked area chart}.

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stacked area chart?

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total cross-border delays?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Documentation Errors}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total cross-border delays?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Political Disruptions}.

VE.Q: What is Documentation Errors's Cross-Border Delays in 1978?
VE.A: Documentation Errors's cross-border delays in 1978 is {11.95} hours.

VE.Q: What is Documentation Errors's Cross-Border Delays in 1980?
VE.A: Documentation Errors's cross-border delays in 1980 is {12.50} hours.

VE.Q: What is Political Disruptions's Cross-Border Delays in 1972?
VE.A: Political Disruptions's cross-border delays in 1972 is {11.21} hours.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum total Cross-Border Delays in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum total cross-border delays is {13.72} hours.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum total Cross-Border Delays in the stacked area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum total cross-border delays is {26.26} hours.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Documentation Errors's Cross-Border Delays area?
SC.A: The average height of Documentation Errors's cross-border delays area is {12.36} hours.

SC.Q: What is the average height of Political Disruptions's Cross-Border Delays area?
SC.A: The average height of Political Disruptions's cross-border delays area is {6.70} hours.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Cross-Border Delays fall between 18 and 20 hours? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Cross-Border Delays exceed 21 hours? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {26.26} hours in {1973}, total value was {24.95} hours in {1974}, total value was {22.81} hours in {1984}.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Cross-Border Delays go below 16 hours? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
NF.A: total value was {14.13} hours in {1982}, total value was {14.98} hours in {1980}, total value was {13.72} hours in {1981}.

NC.Q: Between 1982 and 1983, was the average total Cross-Border Delays higher or lower than between 1975 and 1976?
NC.A: The average total cross-border delays between {1982} and {1983} was {lower} than between {1975} and {1976}.

NC.Q: Between 1979 and 1984, was the average total Cross-Border Delays higher or lower than between 1979 and 1983?
NC.A: The average total cross-border delays between {1979} and {1984} was {higher} than between {1979} and {1983}.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1983, was the average total Cross-Border Delays higher or lower than between 1973 and 1978?
NC.A: The average total cross-border delays between {1981} and {1983} was {lower} than between {1973} and {1978}.

NC.Q: Between 1978 and 1983, was the average total Cross-Border Delays higher or lower than between 1980 and 1982?
NC.A: The average total cross-border delays between {1978} and {1983} was {higher} than between {1980} and {1982}.
